definition: a large ladle, get the better of
details:
noun
- a large ladle
= example: a large ladle
- the shovel or bucket of a dredge or backhoe
= synonyms: scoop shovel
- street names for gamma hydroxybutyrate
= synonyms: soap, max, liquid ecstasy, grievous bodily harm, goop, easy lay
- a news report that is reported first by one news organization
= example: a news report that is reported first by one news organization
= synonyms: exclusive
- the quantity a scoop will hold
= synonyms: scoopful
- a hollow concave shape made by removing something
= synonyms: pocket
verb
- get the better of
= synonyms: best
- take out or up with or as if with a scoop
= example: take out or up with or as if with a scoop
= synonyms: take up, scoop out, lift out, scoop up
